trans-unit.source: Get started using Azure Scheduler in the Azure portal | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Get started using Azure Scheduler in the Azure portal | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: To complete this tutorial, you need an Azure account that has the Azure Scheduler feature enabled.
trans-unit.target: To complete this tutorial, you need an Azure account that has the Azure Scheduler feature enabled.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an account, you can create a free trial account in just a couple of minutes.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an account, you can create a free trial account in just a couple of minutes.

trans-unit.source: For details, refer to <linkText>Azure Free Trial</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For details, refer to <linkText>Azure Free Trial</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: It's easy to create jobs and job collections on Azure Scheduler using the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: It's easy to create jobs and job collections on Azure Scheduler using the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial walks you through the creation of the job collection you will use to store jobs, the creation of a job in a job collection, and an overview of the job monitoring and management tasks available through the portal.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial walks you through the creation of the job collection you will use to store jobs, the creation of a job in a job collection, and an overview of the job monitoring and management tasks available through the portal.

trans-unit.source: You need prior experience with Azure to use this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You need prior experience with Azure to use this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: The first time you open the Azure portal, you are automatically placed at the ALL ITEMS tab.
trans-unit.target: The first time you open the Azure portal, you are automatically placed at the ALL ITEMS tab.

trans-unit.source: The columns in the ALL ITEMS tab can be sorted.
trans-unit.target: The columns in the ALL ITEMS tab can be sorted.

trans-unit.source: To view your Scheduler jobs and job collections, click the SCHEDULER tab.
trans-unit.target: To view your Scheduler jobs and job collections, click the SCHEDULER tab.

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Click App Services > Create New > Scheduler, and then click Custom Create.
trans-unit.target: Click App Services > Create New > Scheduler, and then click Custom Create.

trans-unit.source: In Job Collection, select the name of the existing job collection under the Job Collection drop-down.
trans-unit.target: In Job Collection, select the name of the existing job collection under the Job Collection drop-down.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have an existing job collection you’d like to add the job to, select Create New and enter a name to identify your new job collection.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have an existing job collection you’d like to add the job to, select Create New and enter a name to identify your new job collection.

trans-unit.source: In Region, select the geographic region for the job collection.
trans-unit.target: In Region, select the geographic region for the job collection.

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow key to create the job collection and move to the next stage – creating a job.
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow key to create the job collection and move to the next stage – creating a job.

trans-unit.source: Let’s create a job that simply hits http://www.microsoft.com/ with a GET request.
trans-unit.target: Let’s create a job that simply hits http://www.microsoft.com/ with a GET request.

trans-unit.source: In the Job action screen, define the following values for the requested form fields:
trans-unit.target: In the Job action screen, define the following values for the requested form fields:

trans-unit.source: Name: getmicrosoft
trans-unit.target: Name: getmicrosoft

trans-unit.source: Action Type: HTTP
trans-unit.target: Action Type: HTTP

trans-unit.source: Method: GET
trans-unit.target: Method: GET

trans-unit.source: URI: http://www.microsoft.com
trans-unit.target: URI: http://www.microsoft.com

trans-unit.source: After you create a job, define a schedule.
trans-unit.target: After you create a job, define a schedule.

trans-unit.source: The job could be defined as a one-time job, but let’s pick a recurrence schedule.
trans-unit.target: The job could be defined as a one-time job, but let’s pick a recurrence schedule.

trans-unit.source: Some screenshots in this tutorial show a recurrence of 1 minute for only illustrative purposes, but pick a recurrence of 12 hours.
trans-unit.target: Some screenshots in this tutorial show a recurrence of 1 minute for only illustrative purposes, but pick a recurrence of 12 hours.

trans-unit.source: Recur Every: 12 Hours
trans-unit.target: Recur Every: 12 Hours

trans-unit.source: Starting: Now
trans-unit.target: Starting: Now

trans-unit.source: Ending On: Select date 2 days after current day and any time
trans-unit.target: Ending On: Select date 2 days after current day and any time

trans-unit.source: Click OK.
trans-unit.target: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: It can take a while to create the job and the job collection.
trans-unit.target: It can take a while to create the job and the job collection.

trans-unit.source: To check the status, you can monitor the notifications at the bottom of the portal.
trans-unit.target: To check the status, you can monitor the notifications at the bottom of the portal.

trans-unit.source: After you create the job and job collection, a message tells you that the job or job collection was successfully created.
trans-unit.target: After you create the job and job collection, a message tells you that the job or job collection was successfully created.

trans-unit.source: The job is listed in the Jobs section of the Scheduler section and the job collection is listed in the Job Collections section.
trans-unit.target: The job is listed in the Jobs section of the Scheduler section and the job collection is listed in the Job Collections section.

trans-unit.source: To configure additional advanced settings in the job, refer to the section “Configure a Job” below.
trans-unit.target: To configure additional advanced settings in the job, refer to the section “Configure a Job” below.

trans-unit.source: Once a job collection is created, it appears in the main Scheduler management screen.
trans-unit.target: Once a job collection is created, it appears in the main Scheduler management screen.

trans-unit.source: Click a job collection and a new window opens with the following options:
trans-unit.target: Click a job collection and a new window opens with the following options:

trans-unit.source: Dashboard
trans-unit.target: Dashboard

trans-unit.source: Scale
trans-unit.target: Scale

trans-unit.source: History
trans-unit.target: History

trans-unit.source: Jobs
trans-unit.target: Jobs

trans-unit.source: The following topics describe these tabs in greater detail.
trans-unit.target: The following topics describe these tabs in greater detail.

trans-unit.source: When you click your job collection name, the Dashboard tab is displayed.
trans-unit.target: When you click your job collection name, the Dashboard tab is displayed.

trans-unit.source: The Dashboard displays the following information:
trans-unit.target: The Dashboard displays the following information:

trans-unit.source: A table and series of charts that shows a fixed list of metrics.
trans-unit.target: A table and series of charts that shows a fixed list of metrics.

trans-unit.source: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the health of your job collection including:
trans-unit.target: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the health of your job collection including:

trans-unit.source: Current jobs
trans-unit.target: Current jobs

trans-unit.source: Completed jobs
trans-unit.target: Completed jobs

trans-unit.source: Faulted jobs
trans-unit.target: Faulted jobs

trans-unit.source: Enabled jobs
trans-unit.target: Enabled jobs

trans-unit.source: Disabled jobs
trans-unit.target: Disabled jobs

trans-unit.source: Job executions
trans-unit.target: Job executions

trans-unit.source: A table that shows a fixed list of status and settings metrics.
trans-unit.target: A table that shows a fixed list of status and settings metrics.

trans-unit.source: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the status and settings associated with your job collection including:
trans-unit.target: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the status and settings associated with your job collection including:

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: Region
trans-unit.target: Region

trans-unit.source: Number of Errors
trans-unit.target: Number of Errors

trans-unit.source: Number of Occurrence Faults
trans-unit.target: Number of Occurrence Faults

trans-unit.source: URI
trans-unit.target: URI

trans-unit.source: In the Scale tab, you can change the settings and tier of service used by your Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: In the Scale tab, you can change the settings and tier of service used by your Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: This displays whether you are on the Free or Standard plan.
trans-unit.target: This displays whether you are on the Free or Standard plan.

trans-unit.source: Azure Scheduler implements quotas based on several conditions.
trans-unit.target: Azure Scheduler implements quotas based on several conditions.

trans-unit.source: This section lists the quota thresholds and allows you to change them.
trans-unit.target: This section lists the quota thresholds and allows you to change them.

trans-unit.source: By default, there is one set of quotas configured.
trans-unit.target: By default, there is one set of quotas configured.

trans-unit.source: The limits of these quota settings are constrained by your plan, and changing the Plan may impact pricing..
trans-unit.target: The limits of these quota settings are constrained by your plan, and changing the Plan may impact pricing..

trans-unit.source: Quotas can be changed to scale your Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: Quotas can be changed to scale your Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: Options include:
trans-unit.target: Options include:

trans-unit.source: Max jobs
trans-unit.target: Max jobs

trans-unit.source: Max frequency
trans-unit.target: Max frequency

trans-unit.source: Max interval
trans-unit.target: Max interval

trans-unit.source: The History tab displays the following information for the selected job:
trans-unit.target: The History tab displays the following information for the selected job:

trans-unit.source: A table that displays selected metrics for every job execution in the system for the selected job.
trans-unit.target: A table that displays selected metrics for every job execution in the system for the selected job.

trans-unit.source: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the health of your Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the health of your Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: The following performance counters/metrics are available:
trans-unit.target: The following performance counters/metrics are available:

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Details

trans-unit.source: Retry attempt
trans-unit.target: Retry attempt

trans-unit.source: Number of executions (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.)
trans-unit.target: Number of executions (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.)

trans-unit.source: Timestamp of execution
trans-unit.target: Timestamp of execution

trans-unit.source: You can click View History Details to look at the whole response for every execution.
trans-unit.target: You can click View History Details to look at the whole response for every execution.

trans-unit.source: This dialog box also allows you to copy the response to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: This dialog box also allows you to copy the response to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: The jobs tab displays the following information to monitor the execution history of jobs:
trans-unit.target: The jobs tab displays the following information to monitor the execution history of jobs:

trans-unit.source: A table that displays selected metrics for every job in the system.
trans-unit.target: A table that displays selected metrics for every job in the system.

trans-unit.source: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the health of your Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: These metrics provide real-time values regarding the health of your Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: Clicking on a job name gives you the option to enable, disable, or delete the job.
trans-unit.target: Clicking on a job name gives you the option to enable, disable, or delete the job.

trans-unit.source: Deleted jobs may not be recoverable.
trans-unit.target: Deleted jobs may not be recoverable.

trans-unit.source: The following counters and metrics are available:
trans-unit.target: The following counters and metrics are available:

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Last run
trans-unit.target: Last run

trans-unit.source: Next run
trans-unit.target: Next run

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: Frequency
trans-unit.target: Frequency

trans-unit.source: Failures
trans-unit.target: Failures

trans-unit.source: Faults
trans-unit.target: Faults

trans-unit.source: Executions
trans-unit.target: Executions

trans-unit.source: Action type
trans-unit.target: Action type

trans-unit.source: Clicking on a job in the Jobs screen allows you to configure that job.
trans-unit.target: Clicking on a job in the Jobs screen allows you to configure that job.

trans-unit.source: This lets you configure additional advanced settings beyond what’s available in the quick-create wizard.
trans-unit.target: This lets you configure additional advanced settings beyond what’s available in the quick-create wizard.

trans-unit.source: To configure a job, click the right arrow next to the job’s name in the Jobs screen.
trans-unit.target: To configure a job, click the right arrow next to the job’s name in the Jobs screen.

trans-unit.source: The job configuration page lets you update job settings.
trans-unit.target: The job configuration page lets you update job settings.

trans-unit.source: The job config page is shown below for HTTP and HTTPS jobs.
trans-unit.target: The job config page is shown below for HTTP and HTTPS jobs.

trans-unit.source: For HTTP and HTTPS job action types, you may change the method to any allowed HTTP verb.
trans-unit.target: For HTTP and HTTPS job action types, you may change the method to any allowed HTTP verb.

trans-unit.source: You may also add, delete, or change the headers and basic authentication information.
trans-unit.target: You may also add, delete, or change the headers and basic authentication information.

trans-unit.source: The job config page appears as shown below for storage queue jobs.
trans-unit.target: The job config page appears as shown below for storage queue jobs.

trans-unit.source: For storage queue action types, you may change the storage account, queue name, SAS token, and body.
trans-unit.target: For storage queue action types, you may change the storage account, queue name, SAS token, and body.

trans-unit.source: The “Schedule” section (not shown below) is identical to the “Schedule” section for HTTP/HTTPS job action types.
trans-unit.target: The “Schedule” section (not shown below) is identical to the “Schedule” section for HTTP/HTTPS job action types.

trans-unit.source: Finally, for all action types, you may change the schedule itself and its recurrence behavior.
trans-unit.target: Finally, for all action types, you may change the schedule itself and its recurrence behavior.

trans-unit.source: You may change the start date and time, recurrence schedule, and the end date and time (if the job is recurring.)
trans-unit.target: You may change the start date and time, recurrence schedule, and the end date and time (if the job is recurring.)

trans-unit.source: After making any changes, you may save changes by clicking Save or discard changes by clicking Discard.
trans-unit.target: After making any changes, you may save changes by clicking Save or discard changes by clicking Discard.
